wrestler:HipThrow_Wrestler.NAME: Hip Throw
wrestler:HipThrow_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage.

wrestler:ElbowCut_Wrestler.NAME: Elbow Cut
wrestler:ElbowCut_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, draw a card.

wrestler:EldritchLightning_Wrestler.NAME: Eldritch Lightning
wrestler:EldritchLightning_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Devoid. NL Costs 1 less [E] NL for each time a Void card exhausts. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times.

wrestler:HalfNelson_Wrestler.NAME: Half Nelson
wrestler:HalfNelson_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal an extra !M! damage. NL Apply !wrestler:Grapple! wrestler:Grapple.

wrestler:Jab_Wrestler.NAME: Jab
wrestler:Jab_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage !M! more times.

wrestler:Melee_Wrestler.NAME: Melee
wrestler:Melee_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !wrestler:Grapple! wrestler:Grapple to ALL enemies.

wrestler:PsychedelicIllusion_Wrestler.NAME: Psychedelic Illusion
wrestler:PsychedelicIllusion_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Dexterity this turn.

wrestler:Roughhouse_Wrestler.NAME: Roughhouse
wrestler:Roughhouse_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to each wrestler:Grappled enemy !M! times.

wrestler:Suplex_Wrestler.NAME: Suplex
wrestler:Suplex_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage. Remove all wrestler:Grapple from that enemy.

wrestler:ArmBar_Wrestler.NAME: Arm Bar
wrestler:ArmBar_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, gain !B! Block.

wrestler:CarefulApproach_Wrestler.NAME: Careful Approach
wrestler:CarefulApproach_Wrestler.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !wrestler:Grapple! wrestler:Grapple to ALL enemies. Draw 1 card.

wrestler:CharmingWords_Wrestler.NAME: Charming Words
wrestler:CharmingWords_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL If the enemy is grappled, apply !M! weak.

wrestler:FiremanLift_Wrestler.NAME: Fireman Lift
wrestler:FiremanLift_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Apply !wrestler:Grapple! wrestler:Grapple. NL Each enemy loses HP equal to their wrestler:Grapple.

wrestler:UnearthlySkin_Wrestler.NAME: Unearthly Skin
wrestler:UnearthlySkin_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Strength this turn.

wrestler:BearHug_Wrestler.NAME: Bear Hug
wrestler:BearHug_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, Gain !B! Block and Deal !D! damage.

wrestler:Catapult_Wrestler.NAME: Catapult
wrestler:Catapult_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to each wrestler:Grappled enemy once for each wrestler:Grappled enemy.

wrestler:DragBehind_Wrestler.NAME: Drag Behind
wrestler:DragBehind_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage.

wrestler:EldritchShock_Wrestler.NAME: Eldritch Shock
wrestler:EldritchShock_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Devoid. NL Deal !D! damage to each wrestler:Grappled enemy.

wrestler:Go_Wrestler.NAME: Go
wrestler:Go_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !M! extra damage. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:HammerStrike_Wrestler.NAME: Hammer Strike
wrestler:HammerStrike_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength this turn. NL Draw 1 card.

wrestler:Lariat_Wrestler.NAME: Lariat
wrestler:Lariat_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, NL gain [E] and NL draw 1 card.

wrestler:Pounce_Wrestler.NAME: Pounce
wrestler:Pounce_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Move all wrestler:Grapple to that enemy.

wrestler:WeirdConduit_Wrestler.NAME: Weird Conduit
wrestler:WeirdConduit_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Devoid. NL Deal !M! damage for each Void card in your exhaust pile.

wrestler:BodyShield_Wrestler.NAME: Body Shield
wrestler:BodyShield_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy attacks, deal !M! damage to each wrestler:Grappled enemy.

wrestler:ChillTouch_Wrestler.NAME: Chill Touch
wrestler:ChillTouch_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Devoid. NL Whenever you apply wrestler:Grapple, apply !M! wrestler:Horror.

wrestler:CraveNothing_Wrestler.NAME: Crave Nothing
wrestler:CraveNothing_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Void card exhausts, heal !M! HP.

wrestler:StickyFingers_Wrestler.NAME: Sticky Fingers
wrestler:StickyFingers_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an enemy attacks, Apply !M! wrestler:Grapple.

wrestler:UnnervingLaughter_Wrestler.NAME: Unnerving Laughter
wrestler:UnnervingLaughter_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. wrestler:Devoid. At the start of your turn, apply !M! wrestler:Horror to a random enemy.

wrestler:Chokehold_Wrestler.NAME: Chokehold
wrestler:Chokehold_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: The enemy loses HP equal to !M! times their wrestler:Grapple.

wrestler:GetReady_Wrestler.NAME: Get Ready
wrestler:GetReady_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:GetSet_Wrestler.NAME: Get Set
wrestler:GetSet_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !wrestler:Grapple! wrestler:Grapple. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

wrestler:FullBodyVice_Wrestler.NAME: Full Body Vice
wrestler:FullBodyVice_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is wrestler:Grappled, deal !D! damage. They lose !M! strength this turn.

wrestler:Vanishing_Wrestler.NAME: Vanishing
wrestler:Vanishing_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Devoid. NL Whenever a Void card exhausts, gain !M! Dexterity.
wrestler:Vanishing_Wrestler.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL wrestler:Devoid. NL Whenever a Void card exhausts, gain !M! Dexterity.

wrestler:WearDown_Wrestler.NAME: Wear Down
wrestler:WearDown_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, wrestler:Grappled enemies lose !M! % of their current HP.
wrestler:WearDown_Wrestler.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, wrestler:Grappled enemies lose !M! % of their current HP.

wrestler:Voidlight_Wrestler.NAME: Voidlight
wrestler:Voidlight_Wrestler.DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Devoid. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
wrestler:Voidlight_Wrestler.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: wrestler:Devoid. NL Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.
